title: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman

Finally capable of standing on his own feet, he decided to live life by his own will. He would slay anyone standing in his way… Even if they were a god.

Now go attend Einrogard!” “Patriarch!” My future will be secured once I graduate. For my future!

Geniuses are geniuses, even when gathered among the elites. The research community was flipped on its head by the appearance of a new case. Professors wouldn’t leave him be alone, wanting to make him study directly under them. Officials from all over the kingdom and heads of organizations fidgeted over whether to scout him. “Professor! When can I make a Lich?” “Gimme a break. How talented are you? You’re crossing the line, honestly.” A genius among geniuses had appeared. Illustrator: ChyoChyo

There will come a time when you want to run away. then and now... … .  remember The person the patient can turn to... … . I mean, you're the only one.” The time when life and death intersect has passed. After that!!!!!! The fate of an ordinary intern changed completely. What if you can save it? Besides, there were only those who bother him around… ‘I’ll kill everyone.’ God of Blackfield! He didn’t know why, but that’s the name the enemy made up. It means a god who brings death!

title: Namgung Se-ga, the Crown Prince, is a Martial Arts Genius
description: I swore to ruin Namgung Se-ga, even if it meant becoming a vengeful ghost. And the moment I plunged the sword into my heart without hesitation! [What are you doing killing yourself, you damn brat!] A voice came from the sword my mother had cherished all her life. When my heavy eyelids lifted again, I had escaped from a long nightmare. Did my desperate wish reach the heavens? I was back when I was fifteen. An opportunity to correct a past filled with regrets. I will ruin Namgung Se-ga, who abandoned me, with my own hands.

As he rises through the ranks, he encounters those who would stand in his way. “Why is the Murim Alliance after me…?” “You’ve grown too big to the point of nuisance, so you’re an eyesore.” He returns to the day he started working for the group and makes a firm resolve. This time, he will never regret it. “I will destroy them with the money they look down on so much.” With his genius mind and exceptional talent for martial arts, The journey of a great merchant emperor who will leave his mark on history begins!

title: Martial God of the Sun and Moon
description: Dok Go-hyeon (獨孤玄), the leader of the Cham Ma Brigade (斬魔隊), a mere arrow shield, ended the war. But in the end, he was discarded like an old hunting dog after the hunt. “Sir! Why are you doing this, seriously!” “Life, fate… It’s really something.” Now he is no longer Dok Go-hyeon, the leader of the Cham Ma Brigade, but Dok Go-myung, the world’s greatest fool. No more enduring without reason! I don’t care whether it’s the righteous path (正道) or the evil path (邪道), I’ll go my own way. But before that! There are just way too many people in this world who need a good beating. You’re up first. With the boundless martial arts of the sky in his grasp, Dok Go-myung’s chaotic battle to stop the impending era of turbulence and the invasion of the Divine Blood Sect begins.
author: Injae
price: Wait until Free Period is 3 hours

title: Doctor’s Rebirth
description: [Exclusive Serialization] I had been abroad to do medical volunteer work, when I was swept up in a civil war. I was killed by a rebel soldier, while taking a bullet for a patient. But when I finally woke up, I had become a child?!? And in front of me stood a destroyed carriage and a group of oddly dressed people, who were unconscious! “It’s just like a Murim world.” As I hurry to perform first aid in an attempt to save even one person, I realize that this world is that of [The Supreme Demon King], a Wuxia novel I’ve enjoyed reading. After meeting the rescue team of the ‘Three Great Doctors’, I found out that one of the person I saved was the protagonist of this novel, the future Demon King ‘Yeo Haryun’! “Hey, since I’m indebted to you for saving me, call me ‘hyung’.” For saving his life, I become sworn brothers with the future Demon King, and the White Dragon Godly Doctor, one of the most knowledgeable people around, recognized my potential and took me in as his disciple. This is the story of how I became the greatest physician in Gangho!
author: Taesun
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: The Red Dragon Martial Emperor

The Great Wild Castle, which was everything to him, and the loyal subordinates known as the Three Kings have all vanished in this new era. “If I can restore it, that’s enough.” The era of the Martial Emperor, who will reclaim everything he lost and reign over the world, begins again!

price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Wudang Sacred Scriptures

But can he overcome the needle-sized gateway barely permitted to trainee instructors and rise to become a disciple of the main sect? “A true gentleman cannot stand idle in the face of injustice!” Thus begins Kwak Yeon’s unyielding journey through the martial world, following the ruthless principle of “Kill Buddha, Kill Ancestors”—destroying all obstacles in his path!
author: Bang Su-yoon
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Heavenly Demon of the Huashan Sect

What nonsense is this?” The story of a great demonic master who suddenly became a disciple of the Mount Hua Sect. The Mount Hua Sect, which had been on the path to ruin, begins to rise again.

title: The Third-Rate Martial Artist Who Became The World'S Strongest
description: “I’m sorry, Supreme Sword of the Roaming Martial Artists. Your talent is too dangerous.” While wandering as a lone swordsman, he sought to elevate his third-rate family into a distinguished clan but was ambushed in the shadows. That’s how it ended—or so he thought. “What… why am I eight years old?” A third-rate family, yet unmatched talent. Given another chance at life, this time, he’s determined to turn his family into the most powerful clan under heaven!
author: Yuri Son
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Path of Immortal
description: From the author of <King of Ruin>, <Muin's Wolf>, and <Journey of the Warrior>, comes a brand-new series: <The Path of the Immortal>! Dalcheon, who mastered the pinnacle of martial arts at the age of fifteen, ventures into the world at his master's urging. 'What will you do while wandering? Why not establish a school?' 'A school?' 'Like a village academy where children learn the Thousand-Character Classic.' Young Dalcheon learns from the world, while simultaneously teaching others the way of the immortal and the path of life. Dalcheon, now a sage, trains successors to prepare for the impending crisis in Joseon!
author: Boy's Journey
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Unbeaten Misconduct
description: The path of justice and discipline unfolded by the boy Jang Musul, who has unyielding courage, with a single sword. New martial arts novel <Unbeaten Misconduct> by the author of <The Wasteland King>, Soyeonhaeng. “It means not to yield. It's Musul (無述).” During the violent famine period of the Joseon era, the boy Jang Musul, who was left to the Muisa temple in the mountains due to severe poverty. The seven-year-old child, who grew up under the care of his aunt after his parents left the world early, now begins to live in the temple with the monks. The big monk, who had been watching Musul causing a commotion in the temple with big and small pranks, has Monk Wonmyeong teach him martial arts... “He is a child who has the qualities to reach the state of enlightenment through martial arts (武).” Monk Wonmyeong, a martial monk (武僧) staying near Cheonaeam of Muisa, realizes that Musul's abilities are extraordinary as he teaches him martial arts. This young boy, who can grasp all movements just by watching once, was a natural-born martial artist (武骨) who digests movements better than any martial artist in Cheonaeam. Wonmyeong senses some destiny from the boy with compassion, sympathy, and unyielding courage. “This sword comes with a duty from the king. It must be received by someone who is willing to sacrifice his life for the king in any situation.” Wonmyeong hands over the 'Saengji (泩池)', a famous sword meaning a deep and wide pond, to Musul. It was a sword handed down by Taejo to be used to protect the country. The young Musul, now the sixth owner of Saengji, stands on the path of justice and discipline.
author: Boy's Journey
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Northern Expedition
description: The Northern Army of Joseon. They are willing to follow the unchanging rule of life until the day they die. In the early days of Joseon, the Northern Army was the most powerful military force. A boy enlists, becomes a five-star general, and even becomes a prime minister. This is the northern conquest story of the young Pilhan! * It was just a desperate rush to the guy's neck, but the guy collapsed weakly with a precisely aimed sword strike. 'One.' Han's sword stabbed the fallen guy's side. A scream was heard. 'Two.' The guy twisted and fell, but a bolt also fell. 'Three.' The guy who tried to cut Pilhan's neck flew off with a single cut and fell to the ground.
author: Boy's Journey
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Martial Artist's Journey

At the end of spring, rumors begin to circulate that a new border guard is taking office. “It's always the same people coming. Is it the same this time?” “Yes, they're all the same. Every single one of them.” Jung Sung Jin, who was appointed as a border guard protecting the northeastern border, felt a martial energy that was hard to explain in words. Martial Artist Jung Sung Jin, defeat the Yeojin tribe and rule over Joseon!

A monumental fantasy series by Lee Young-do, equipped with an obsessive theme consciousness and fantastical fun.

title: Service Beverage, Served
description: “I've hired a manager you can trust, so I hope you'll manage the cafe well with him.” One morning, Woo-mi, who went from being a reporter to unemployed, was left with a short message from her uncle before he left for Hawaii. The problem is, Woo-mi, who inherited her detective father's on-the-scene nature to her bones, finds life in the cafe extremely boring. “As a cafe manager, my job is to manage and supervise Mr. Doumi, the only part-time worker.” A person trying to escape the cafe by chasing after an incident, and a person trying to stop it. Can Woo-mi and Yeon-ho really manage a 'quiet cafe'? “Service beverage, served. Please tell me your story. I will help you.”

title: Joseon Night Tales

I'm Musim of the Pil-dong book alley!"_Joseon's greatest erotic writer, 'Musim' "If that's what you desire, then the survivor shall become king."_The tragic prince, 'Myeong' Musim, the only female worker at Gyeongdeok Bookstore, has a secret life, which was the most renowned erotic writer in Joseon, Geobongdaesa. As usual, Musing gets inspiration for her novel by touching and feeling the solid body of a man she accidentally encounters while brainstorming a new work, and gives birth to her life's masterpiece, 'Ssanghwajeom'. As expected, as soon as Ssanghwajeom was released, it became the talk of the town to the point where there was no one who didn't know... One day, out of the blue, 'Hyehwa' from Hanyang's best gisaeng house, Yeongwolgak, comes to her. Hyehwa asks Musing to write the story she wants... Illustration ⓒMAGGIE Produced by Orange Track (orangetrack@orangetrack.kr)

title: Dragon Raja
description: “For us imperfect humans to interact with the nearly perfect dragons, we need the Dragon Raja.” A masterpiece fantasy series by author Lee Young-do, who recorded sales of 2 million copies in Korea, Japan, and Taiwan with his infinite imagination, deep world view, and excellent workmanship!

price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: President of the Night

author: Lee Won-ho
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: The Soul Guardians
description: With a total sales of 10 million copies, ranking first in sales at bookstores nationwide, and being the number one bestseller in the history of Korean genre novels, even just by looking at the records, one can easily tell that "The Soul Guardians" is a masterpiece that represents Korean fantasy, along with Lee Woo-hyuk's other works "Chiwoo Cheonwanggi" (6 volumes in total, published by Elixir) and "Waeran Terminator" (to be published by Elixir). The story of "The Soul Guardians" revolves around four 'exorcists': Father Park, who protects everyone by emitting aura with his deep faith; Hyunam, a young man who has acquired high-level martial arts after meeting a qi master; Junho, a boy who is proficient in talismans and spells with his innate spiritual abilities; and Seunghee, a tomboyish young lady who amplifies the power of the three as the incarnation of the King of Love. Using well-known horror stories, legends, and myths as material, it combines various religions and philosophies such as Taoism, Christianity, mystery religions, and shamanism to depict the stories and adventures of the four people chasing supernatural and mysterious events.
author: Lee Woo-hyuk
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: In Refuge, There Was Paradise [Complete Version for 19+]
description: Seven marriages. Five bereavements, one divorce. Thanks to the arranged marriages orchestrated by her uncle, the beautiful Cecilia became wealthier with each marriage. She believed all the wealth and power she acquired were hers. But it was all a delusion. She realized this only at the moment of her execution, falsely accused of poisoning her seventh husband. She was foolish. She trusted her uncle too much. Not once had she decided her own future. Waking up with intense regret, Cecilia found herself back shortly after her third marriage. Her third husband was Rusell Cardros, the lord of the cursed land of Lagos. He never laid a finger on her and agreed to a divorce after two years without any qualms. ‘What did this man gain from our marriage?’ ‘Why did I return to the time right after my marriage to this man?’
author: Haneulgari
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Do All Mothers in Childcare Novels have to Die?
description: “I command King of Nieta to give the kingdom’s princess. I will return to the empire with the princess.” The memory of my previous life came to my mind the moment I became a hostage to the empire, this is the world inside the imperial childcare novel, and I was the heroine’s mother. The mother who died giving birth to the heroine according to the cliché law of childcare novel. I didn’t want to die, so I tried to run away, but I was caught as soon as I left the stables. “My hostage was trying to run away.” That too, the emperor of the empire, the person responsible for it. There was nothing I could do until I was dragged along and became an empress. Then I tried to become an empress who went unnoticed and abandoned. “Let’s always sleep in the same bed. You and me.” But, why the hell is the emperor in my palace?! Does he have nothing to do? The empress dowager only says that when she sees me, I remind her of when she was young and cries. The emperor insists on not visiting the empress dowager. The mother and the son seemed to have a bad relationship, so I reconciled them…. “If Your Majesty is being mean, tell me secretly. Then I’ll help you somehow.” Even the empress dowager, who had regained her son’s love. “I have never been attached to anyone. But I kept my eyes on you.” Why does this handsome emperor suddenly look at me with his twinkling eyes…. I really want to run away. If I had a baby with this man, everyone would be happy except me. But why can’t I leave the man who whispers that he’s lonely?
author: Totota
price: Wait until Free Period is 3 hours

title: I Don't Care, The Prince Is Going To Marry Me Anyway
description: I've been reincarnated as the side character lady who's engaged to the prince. I'm not happy about it. The prince is a villain who hits on the female lead while ignoring his fiancée, only to be defeated by the male lead. In the end, there's a one-line afterword saying he apologized to his fiancée and got married. Well, even though he's a jerk, he's handsome. And as the third prince, he doesn't have to worry about ruling the country. He's a pretty good husband candidate. Go wild, do whatever you want. You're going to marry me anyway. I'll just sit back and enjoy while you create your dark history! "Don't expect me to dance with you at this ball, Dory Redfield. Or maybe not even at the next one." "Yes, Your Highness." "We are engaged, but.........well?" "It was just a casual remark made by our parents. Don't worry about it, Your Highness. I'm really okay with it." "Is... is that so? Is that so, Dory?" Why are you so surprised, you prince? You were the one who started talking nonsense first. Have you no conscience? But then, this guy asks me a really strange question. "...Do you, perhaps, have another man?" You're hitting on the female lead, and now you're asking me this? Just bear with it. This guy will regret it later. I'll just stay as your devoted fiancée until then! "What are you talking about? A woman like me, who is neither beautiful nor has a pleasant personality, what man would—" "What? Who dared to say that?" ...You, from the original story. This guy is so strange. The problem isn't just him. "My dear sister Dory, the dress you're wearing today is terrible. No wonder there are rumors that His Highness has abandoned you." "It can't be helped. His Highness is too good for me." "... Wait. Too good for you? Who said that? Did you really get dumped?" My sister, Natalia, the original villainess, is suddenly showing an interest in my love life. Why do the trash characters from the original have to growl at each other over me?
author: Powerful Bellflower
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Contract Marriage: Rewritten [Complete Version for 19+]
description: Laniakea, the royal princess scorned for her weak elemental power. She always dreamed of escaping the contempt directed at her. One day, a marriage proposal arrived from the Empire. The suitor? Hyperion, the First Imperial Prince, with no political base or support to his name. Laniakea willingly accepted the proposal. She didn’t care who her husband would be, as long as she could leave her homeland. Before the wedding, Laniakea saw the marriage contract presented to her. [ The couple shall engage in interc**rse __ time(s) every __ for the purpose of producing an heir. ]Fortunately, that clause remained incomplete, and the marriage proceeded as it was. As expected, her husband only dined with her a few times a year and didn’t even stay in the Imperial Palace, returning to the borderlands instead. For three years, this continued. She thought she could quietly live out her days until another prince ascended to the throne, at which point she could leave the palace for good… “The Second, Third, and Fourth Princes have all passed away!” While everyone was reeling in shock, Hyperion returned to the Imperial Palace, swiftly brought order to the chaos, and ascended to the throne. What the newly crowned Emperor needed now was a strong Empress to solidify imperial authority. ‘So, he’ll divorce me and remarry someone from a powerful family.’ That’s what she assumed… “You summoned me…?” “Yes. Because there’s something I must ask of you.” With a resolute expression as if he’d made up his mind, Hyperion spoke seriously, causing Laniakea to swallow nervously. ‘The moment has finally come.’ “I know what you want. Don’t worry. I’m willing to comply with Your Majesty’s wishes.” “…Is that so?” She had no doubt that they were both thinking the same thing. “Let’s sign the divorce agreement right away.” “Let’s have a child right away—son or daughter, it doesn’t matter.” It was then that Laniakea realized. Her husband had something entirely different in mind.
author: Baeksulhong
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: I Became the Youngest Sister-in-law of the Ruined Reverse Harem’s Male Leads
description: I was reincarnated into a wretched harem story with no dreams or hopes, when the heroine died for some reason. The shock of the original story being destroyed disappeared after a while. My older sisters then started to get involved with the male leads. The playful and obsessive emperor found my eldest sister, who was mature and affectionate. The blunt and strongest swordsman in the Empire matched with my cheerful second sister. Meanwhile, my cynical youngest sister was paired with the playboy Head of the Magic Tower. And me? I’m only six years old, so I’m not allowed to have a love interest. Anyway, my sisters got along well with the male leads and held their weddings. But… “Liliana. Call me ‘Oppa’.” My youngest brother-in-law tried to win me over with splendid illusion magic and asked me. “Am I your favorite brother?” My second brother-in-law, the swordmaster, carried me on his shoulders and coaxed in a whisper. “Liliana. As my youngest sister-in-law, you will live in the Imperial Palace and be treated like a princess.” My eldest sister nodded nonchalantly upon hearing the Emperor’s declaration. But I only want to go back to the time when I lived with my sisters and there were just the four of us? #Childcare #Affection #ThisAbility #TinyFemaleLead #ChildhoodFriendMaleLead #TheCoolestSistersInTheWorld #ThreeBrothersInLaw #BrotherInLaw1(Emperor) #BrotherInLaw2(SwordMaster) #BrotherInLaw3(GeniusMagicTowerMaster)
author: Madrum
price: Wait until Free Period is 3 hours

title: A Strange But Effective Villainess Life
description: Kiana, the troublemaker of the Prelai duchy. I was about to give up my life as a villainess and be reborn as a new person. Until one day, the family was hanged for treason. ‘There’s no need to kill me, who ran away from home 7 years ago and is only doing research in the countryside!’ The moment I realized that the academy, who said that I was a genius and would treat like a family, betrayed me, and that treason was also falsely accused by someone… Due to a mysterious power, I returned to a year ago! “I can’t help it. Now that it’s like this, I, who is smart and strong, has no choice but to save the family.” There were two things to do for the family. “Will I be of help to you someday too?” “I tried to save him because he is precious to my grandfather.” Restoring the relationship with the family, which was a mess, and… “Please pretend to be in a relationship with me externally.” Holding hands with ‘that man’. Oh, before that. Pouring a water bottle over the dean’s head during the lecture, I said, “This is gravity.” Get revenge on those academy guys who have no morals. Kiana, who came back smarter and more vicious, has returned with a <Strange but Effective Villainess Life>.
author: Yunajin
price: Wait until Free Period is 3 hours

title: The Return of the Namgoong Clan’s Granddaughter
description: I thought I had been abandoned, But I was actually the child that the Namgoong family had been searching for. It wasn’t until I was killed by the Blood Demon, whom I had called “teacher,” that I learned the truth. When I awoke again as a thirteen-year-old child, I decided to return to the Namgoong family. I didn’t seek to be recognized as family. I only wanted to prevent the Namgoong family from falling apart as it had before. “This is the jewelry, silk, gold bars, and elixirs that the family head has gifted to you.” “Here, little one. This is a congratulatory gift for your return.” As soon as I was recognized as the lost granddaughter of the Namgoong family, I gained delicious food, fine clothes, gold and silver treasures, and a high-quality sword! I also gained a grandfather and a father who cried and laughed for me. But what was that strange, tingling feeling in my chest every time that happened? In order to protect the smiles of those I had once killed, and to preserve this warm and ticklish sensation for as long as I could, I was determined to change the bloody future that awaited me, unlike my previous life… Namgoong Mucheon’s face darkened. ‘Is this child truly raised to be an assassin?’ The sharp killing intent and the sword techniques essential for an assassin were reflected in her life, as if they were embedded in her very being. ‘Damn brat.’ Anger surged within Namgoong Mucheon. He restrained himself from cursing aloud in front of his granddaughter, muttering in his mind instead. ‘How dare they raise my granddaughter as an assassin?’ The blue energy surrounding Namgoong Mucheon grew even stronger. The eun's long martial arts romance fantasy novel <The Return of Namgung's Granddaughter>
author: The eun
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
description: Siana was the princess of a small kingdom. Until the Imperial Army attacks… Right before her head is blown off by the cruel prince, Siana screamed. “Please spare me!” Toward the crown prince with red blood on his beautiful face. She begged in a desperate voice. “I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t it be perfect to treat me as a maid?” So Siana became the apprentice maid of the imperial palace. However, the work suits my aptitude more than I thought?! If you use a broom, the hallway will be clean. If you knead the dough, sweet cookies are baked. When you do laundry, the white comforter smells great! I just did my best as a maid. The imperial family slowly begins to open their hearts to Siana. “Your tea is always the best.” “A dress you made? It’s very beautiful.” “I want to ask you to educate the prince.” But I never intended to capture this man’s heart… “Me, too.” “……” “I can’t live without you, Siana.” Siana tightly closed her eyes at the sorrowful voice of the prince. Look, Your Highness. I want to live as an ordinary maid!
author: Kim Boppy
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: The Strongest Family Has Arrived!
description: Ryan, a man falsely accused of massacre, finished his 12-year prison sentence. He emerged, sharpening his blade of revenge. “She is your daughter, Young Master.” “…Bullshit.” A daughter was waiting for him…? “Ah, Appa!” “Hey, do you want to die? Why am I your appa?” “I will take revenge on Father.” Ryan, the strongest, hiding his power and seeking revenge (?), and “I’ll help you. Let’s take revenge together.” Vania, his daughter (?), hiding secrets and trying to help him with his revenge. A fake father and daughter, abandoned by their family, succeed in their revenge, and starting from nothing, become the Empire’s strongest family! <The Strongest Family Has Arrived!>
author: Go Eun Chae
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: The Male Leads Are Trapped in My House
description: I was reincarnated as the heiress of a conglomerate in the novel. However there was a problem, this world was about to be destroyed by a virus monster. All I have left is money, I quickly bought in the countryside and built a shelter to avoid monsters…The world went down much faster than I expected, f*ck! And somehow, even the male leads are trapped with me in my house. But it doesn’t seem like these two wanted to leave. Why is it as if you guys have no intention of going to the female lead? “What the hell are you?” “I think she knew about the fact that the world would be destroyed.” They had a lot of questions for me but I couldn’t answer them. It’s not like you’re going to believe me anyway, right? Now, in my eyes, they just look like good manpower resources. “Now let’s get to work, pay as much as you eat!” If we manage to find a cure for the virus, the cause of the world’s collapse, our hellish times will be over. So, let’s roll the male leads until then and hold out! But there’s one problem. This old mansion I bought turned out to be quite suspicious. What the hell is going on in my house?
author: Kim Jia
price: Wait until Free Period is 3 hours

title: X's Circumstances
description: The whole world tells me to abandon you. A bastard. The daughter of a barmaid. A gold digger obsessed with money. But I couldn’t let go. Not when you had no one else to turn to. I wanted you desperately. You, who never broke under anything. Even if I had to defile you. Even if it meant turning my back on the entire world. Shin Ije, the CEO of a startup on the verge of a major merger and acquisition with a conglomerate, unexpectedly reunites with his ex-girlfriend. She is none other than Im Hara, now working for the labor law firm The On, which has been hired for the deal. But seeing her again, after she had torn his heart apart and vanished without a trace, only for her to reappear with an indifferent face, drives him to the brink. “It’s been so long, I don’t even remember.” “As long as you’re doing well now, that’s all that matters.” Shin Ije exhales a burning breath and rakes his hand through his hair roughly. What do you know? Im Hara, what could you possibly understand? About someone so broken, barely breathing, and holding on by a thread.
author: Seolriyeon
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: The White Tiger Clan’s Baby Cotton Ball
description: The cherished youngest daughter of the Vermillion Bird clan, Jeok So-ya, was suddenly revealed to be a fake daughter. “Take away her Spirit Core and lock her in the Cold Palace.” Though hurt by her family’s coldness and persecution, she endured. Because she was a wicked fledgling who deceived and saddened her family. “Get rid of her.” But that didn’t mean she was ready to accept death. “What’s this little cotton ball?” At the moment of crisis, the one who saved So-ya was a ferocious tiger… No, it was the patriarch of the White Tiger clan. “I’m going to steal you, Cotton Ball.” Accepting his suspicious offer, So-ya ends up in the land of the White Tiger. She planned to keep a low profile here, but the people of the White Tiger clan seem… a little odd? “Don’t worry about being a bother. Stay here for as long as you like.” The patriarch, who’s infamously ferocious, was overly friendly. “Call me ‘Elder Brother’, So-ya.” “Me too! I’m your Elder Brother now, too, Cotton Ball!” The young lords of the White Tiger clan competed amongst themselves to be called her brother. And most strangely… “Our little cotton ball lady is just too adorable!” “Grr-hmph! Bet your family doesn’t have a cotton ball this cute!” ‘Am I… cute? Not pitiful or hideous?’ #ParentingStory #EasternFantasy #BeastFolk #HealingStory #GrowthStory #FledglingHeroine #CapableHeroine #KindHero #DevotedHero #CapableHero #FamilyRegret #GoodTriumphsOverEvil
author: Kkulkki
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Temptation of Brother's Friend
description: Between her older brother and his friends, Iseo grew up like a flower in a greenhouse. With her brother constantly worrying about her every move, she’s never had a chance to date anyone. Frustrated by her lack of romantic experience, Iseo impulsively makes a bold proposal to her brother’s friend, Taein. “Oppa, teach me how to kiss.” That kiss with Taein left Iseo dazed and breathless. Since that day, her heart flutters every time she sees him. To make matters worse, Taein ends up staying at her house for a while… “Our kissing practice hasn’t even properly started.” “…Oppa.” “From now on, come to my room every night.” Taein’s dark eyes glimmered with an intense, unspoken heat. “I… trust you. You wouldn’t do anything dangerous…” “If you knew what I was thinking right now, you wouldn’t say that.” His gaze swept over every detail of her face, sliding like a touch that lingered, making Iseo swallow nervously.

title: 1st in Class Hides Regression
description: Kang Da-hye is a long-term baeksu living an ordinary life. On the day she fails to get another full-time job, she regresses back to 11 years ago. “I’m a high school student again!” “I have to take the SATs again and go to college!” “I’m really going to do well in this life.” She passed the SAT. She got into Hankuk University and got a job in the last semester. She earns money and buys stocks and coins in advance. She lives hard with that mindset, but boys keep bothering her. “Kang Dahye. I hate you the second most in our class.” Jung Eun-sung was there when I regressed. The main vocalist of a male idol group that debuted a year later. “Dahye, have you seen where Jisoo is?” Seo Jae-gyeom, her crush during that time. The illegitimate son of a chaebol where her mom worked as a helper. They’re both very handsome, What the hell! Her life is more important to her now than because her life will definitely be ruined in 11 years. But… “You know how much I like you.” “Can’t you just un-like me? I’ve done nothing wrong…” As usual, life doesn’t work out the way you think. ‘Guys, I have to study…’ #Regression #School #RomCom #Growth #FirstLove #MutualSalvation
author: Yoo Ji-min
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: I’m an Unknown Actress, But Everyone Knows Me
description: “That time on the stairs, the one who pushed me… it was you, Do Gyeoul?” No matter how hard I tried, I couldn’t succeed, let alone debut. I always thought it was my fault. [No matter how hard you tried, did the situation refuse to improve? Oh dear, could that really have been your fault?] But the truth was different. “Yeoreum, right now, you look really pathetic….” [Due to an error, your points have been transferred to someone else for 10 years.] All my frustrations and failures—it was because of you, Do Gyeoul. The reason I couldn’t reach my cherished goal of becoming an actress was because of you. I realized it the moment I died, when a status window appeared before my eyes. And then, immediately after, as if it were a lie— “…What is this?” [♣From an unknown, nameless actress to a national star!♣ Let’s make your name known far and wide. Reborn as an actor who will go down in history.] I returned to when I was twenty years old. A time when I could change everything. ‘I mustn’t be overshadowed by Do Gyeoul’s connections this time.’ “Hello, I’m Han Yeoreum, here for today’s model audition.” So I went to find someone who would become the greatest photographer in Korea’s future, “Then, I’ll start my acting now.” And I auditioned for the lead role in the drama destined to make waves. I took back everything she had stolen from me, one by one. And when I did— -At the pre-edit screening, Jegal Rok… I heard he’s planning to attend. The biggest figures in the entertainment industry began to focus on me. “But, Yeoreum.” My peer and, before my regression, a triple-million-hit actor. Myeong Je-ha smiled faintly with his handsome face. “It’s strange… This is your first play, but you act like you’ve memorized all the lines….” Ding—! [Name: Myeong Je-ha] Level: An eternally breathing star At that moment, I realized. “I’ll listen to the lie you’ve prepared next time.” The man in front of me was also a regressor. #EntertainmentIndustry #CapableFemaleLead #ActressFemaleLead #GrowingFemaleLead #RefreshingFemaleLead

title: The phone call you are making right now
description: Hong Hee-joo, a sign language interpreter, closed her mouth due to severe tantrums. 3 years of arranged marriage. It's been three years since I lived without talking to my husband. One day, when resignation was the norm, Hee-ju was captured by a hostage taker... … ! ‘Don’t hang up, don’t hang up! This is not voice phishing... … !' However, my husband, who is worse than anyone else, coldly hangs up the phone. -If the body comes out, call me then. You bastard, you really are such a bad bastard! Hee-ju, who exploded in anger, hides her identity and threatens her husband directly. The problem is that he is a Blue House spokesperson who is famous for his sharp tongue. ―Aren’t you going to threaten me at the right time? “no… … ” ―This person is waiting without eating because they are being threatened by a blackmailer. “what… … ” ―Are you having fun with someone else instead of me? “… … yes?“ Wait, is this the sociopath husband I knew?

title: A Madman in Love
description: There are all sorts of lunatics in the world: Self-centered, reckless, psychotic, impulsive, obsessive, and pe*verted. As far as Suin knows, that man embodied every single one of those traits—an obsessive, pe*verted psycho. And now, that lunatic is back. “Finally, we meet.” “Adult Lee Suin.” He didn’t even try to hide the sticky hunger in his gaze, like a starved lion finally spotting its prey. “A job reassignment?” “I want Lee Suin to help me.” Chairman Woo Ilhwa, unaware of his son’s true intentions, reassigns Suin, his chief secretary, to serve as his son’s personal secretary. This forces Suin into close proximity with the man who’s been preying on her from the shadows. “Wait for me, Lee Suin.” During his eleven years of exile, Jaehee had dreamed of one thing: A proper relationship—not as a restricted minor, but as a full-grown adult. A relationship where he could take what he wanted, whenever and however he pleased. That’s why, even though Suin was as rigid as a steel rod, his sly persistence ignited the spark within him whenever he faced her. “What do you want from me?” “You.” “Lee Suin.” But it seems Suin has been flirting with some bastard behind his back, and Jaehee’s jealousy and obsession explode. “Don’t take a single step.” “Unless you want to see me go completely insane.” What nonsense. You were already insane to begin with.  Illustrator: BADegg
author: Park Ji Young

title: Don't Expect Love
description: “Live as if you're dead while spending my money.” Ki Chae-heon, who was suffering from mistrust of women for some reason, needs a sham marriage for stake succession. He chooses a woman with many flaws and a difficult family situation as his bride. “Miss Yoo Yeon-ah, you can't expect anything from me except money. Living like a dead person, that's the wife I want.” “Like a dead person…….” His low voice was sharply thrown, but the person who took it was just calm. No, is it his illusion that she seems satisfied somewhere? They will share the same space but will not invade each other's territory. It was a rational combination tangled with interest. Regardless of the strange attitude of the woman. A woman who lives happily(?) as if she's dead, and a man who cares about such a woman. That's how the strange married life began.

title: Home, Bitter Home: Motel California
description: “Will you sleep with me? I wish I could be your first.” On the last night of her nineteenth year, the audacious girl Ji Kang-hee from H Village asked. “My first is... you. Whenever that is. So, I'll wait.” The pure-hearted boy Cheon Yeon-soo from H Village answered at the end of his teens. Unable to mortgage the rest of her life in a place other than Seoul, Kang-hee escaped H Village on the first day of her twenties, longing for her body's moisture to be the 'Arisu' filled with salt, not the groundwater of H Village. 12 years after leaving H Village, the car woman stained with fine dust and exhaust gas occasionally misses the servant of H Village. Yeon-soo's world was divided into two on the last day of his nineteenth year. A world with Kang-hee and a world without her. He wanted to build a picture-like house on that blue meadow and live a lifetime with our beloved 'Kang-hee'. 12 years since Kang-hee left for Seoul, giving him an empty can at the bus terminal. Even while treating a calf, even while putting down a foot-and-mouth disease vaccine, he occasionally misses Kang-hee. #Cover Illustration: Kim Dan-woo
author: Shim Yoon-seo

title: Limits of Obsession [Complete Version for 19+]
description: “I... I'm not a fun woman. I don't even know how to entertain men.” “Yeseo... Is that what worries you?” Hyun asked, calling her name like a sigh. “Don't worry about such things.” A boring woman, huh. You don't even know how much joy you bring me. I couldn't take my eyes off her when she looked scared, despite her usual defiance. Hyun, more intrigued than ever, twisted his lips in front of the timid woman's face. “What to do. You'll end up only looking at me.” Her white skin was clear even up close. He slowly raised his hand to touch her cheek. Her soft skin slipped through his fingers like a baby's. Her black pupils were even more moist and dark up close. If his words came true and she ended up only looking at him with those eyes. “I really can't stand it.” I can't help it if you can't be mine, Jin Yeseo. You can't avoid it, so you have to adapt. I've wanted you so much since the day I first saw you.

title: The Sickly Beauty is My Crazy Younger Brother
description: One day, without warning, I found myself reincarnated into a BL novel. And not just as anyone, but as Rowen, the trashy sub-character who kept interfering between the adopted main character and the protagonist, earning the wrath of the readers! In order to avoid being killed like in the original work, he does his best to be good to his brother... “Get lost! What am I, a baby?! I'm 13 now!” He was supposed to be a sickly beauty in the original work, so why has he turned into this mess? “Didn't you promise back then?” “...What promise?” “That you'd stay by my side. Don't tell me you weren't serious?” Furthermore, the protagonist also starts reading too much into his words as a friend. Why are you guys like this? Please, you two should be in love!

title: A Case of Transmigrating as a Sick Villain [BL]
description: I possessed the sickly older brother of the main character in the 19+ BL novel 《Grey》. The problem is that the villain, who torments the main character and obsesses over the protagonist, disappears without a trace. In such cases, the best is the cliché of amnesia, which can occur without context and without asking any questions. “I only remember my name. Baek Jin-gyeom.” But the reactions are strange. It's not going as I expected? “Do you really want to find your memory?” Baek Jin-woo, who seems to be revealing that he is not looking for his memory. “Are you not interested in me now?” The main character, Tak Won-beom, who should have been disgusted rather than interested. “I thought of you even when I went home yesterday.” The sub-main character, Seon Su-hyuk, who keeps approaching. ……Is this possession okay?

title: Wild Card [BL][Complete 19+]
description: Shin Sung-ha, a pitcher struggling in the minor leagues, becomes entangled with Woo Seung-gun, a major league star pitcher he idolized. However, rather than being excited or happy about this dream-like relationship, he worries. "I want you to stay at the top, senior." "..." "So we can't date. I hope you just play baseball, senior." Baseball over romance. He didn't want Woo Seung-gun, who was showing the pinnacle of baseball, to become unstable because of him. But Woo Seung-gun was tenacious. "Did you not like sleeping with me?" "...Pardon?" "We weren't bad. You were clinging to me like crazy..." "No, what are you talking about!" He tries to start a relationship with him after many twists and turns, but a terrible incident befalls the two. Despite repeated regressions, he can't prevent Woo Seung-gun's death. Finally, after three regressions, Sung-ha goes back three years. To save Woo Seung-gun, he tries to erase their relationship and aims to leap as a batter, not a failed pitcher. G Bagen's long BL novel <Wild Card> #PitcherCrazyForBaseball #BallWithSecret #SwitchHitterPitcher #LeftHandFireballerBall #CuteAndPrettyPitcher #ArrogantButGeniusBall #FindingTheCulprit #BaseballStory #Mystery #RegressionStory

title: [BL] Challenge! S-Class Idol
description: Yejoon, a member of the failed idol group 'B-DAY', suddenly dies in a hit-and-run accident. After realizing his own death, Yejoon expects to go to the afterlife, but then he hears from a suddenly appearing system that if he succeeds in debuting in a novel, he will be revived. Moreover, he is given the opportunity to debut in another popular group by turning back time to 5 years ago. He decides to possess a character in a novel he read a few years ago. Thus, Yejoon enters the novel and struggles alone to achieve his goal, but it's not easy. He thought he would naturally enter the body of the protagonist 'Jung Ji-on', but he possessed the body of a villain with the same name as him. However, he can't go back to the gates of the afterlife, so he tries hard to do his best, but he is assigned to the lowest class 'Class 4' in the personal evaluation, and due to the ridiculous ability of the 'villain Ji Yejoon', Yejoon unintentionally makes mistakes in every competition. Will Yejoon be able to succeed in joining the debut group and return to the time he wants.

title: The Villainous Omega Wants to Escape from the Drama [Complete Version for 19+]
description: I've possessed the role of a young mother-in-law in a BL web drama my sister used to watch. Why am I, a man, playing the role of a mother-in-law? And why is my son-in-law also a man?! What's this about an Omega-verse and heat cycles?! This is a romantic comedy(?) about Geon-ah Jang, who mistakenly possessed an omega in a ridiculous omega-verse drama, trying various attempts to escape. *** “Why are you so off today? It's not like you, mother.” ‘Eek.’ I almost screamed on the spot. Mother, mother! It was an unbelievable word coming from the mouth of a man who is taller than me. “It's not something for you to worry about, Haejung.” “Haejung?” Haejung's low voice was filled with confusion. I shut my mouth, thinking, ‘Oops, did I get the title wrong?’ Haejung was still staring at me with his arms crossed. Was it an illusion that a faint light seemed to flicker in his deep black eyes? #DramaPossession #VillainPossession #RidiculousDrama #OmegaVerse #PassionateOmega #DominantAlpha * This work is a complete version for 19+. title: I Think the Old Man Likes Me [Complete Version for 19+]
description: After 5 years as neighbors and 2 years as lovers, Yebon got dumped by his older boyfriend, who even slapped him and cursed at him. In his resentment, he took out his frustrations on a guy who was staring at him, but this guy… he’s definitely a gangster, a thug…! “Hey.” His voice seemed to smell of cigarettes. It was a rough, deep voice that crawled along the damp floor. The man was so tall that Yebon had to crane his neck painfully just to meet his gaze. “You shouldn’t say you’ll slap someone so carelessly.” Yebon cautiously opened his tightly closed mouth to ask. “…Why?” The man, who cast a sidelong glance at Yebon, who was full of caution, placed his hand on his shoulder and leaned in close. The scent of heavy musk mixed with a sharp fragrance seemed to envelop Yebon’s neck. “It would be a waste to just let this go.” Expectantly.

title: December [BL][Complete Version for 19+]
description: *This work is an AU version (Omega-verse world) of <July>. Please refer to this when reading. It has a separate content from <July>, so you can read it without having seen <July>. *Please note that this work includes extra episodes. He discovered a runaway child next to a fallen motorcycle at the crack of dawn on December 31st. “Did you run away from home?” “f*ck.” “You’re an Alpha, right?” “How…did you know?” “Well, just.” “You’re…an Omega?” Yeonwoo, who momentarily helped an Alpha boy similar to his height. His misery was too intense for him to recall that tiny detail of help. As he returned to school after a three-year break, as if he had fled from terrible things about dominant Alphas, he met an Alpha in the library. Tall, with a pleasant pheromone that spread as though possessed. He continued to approach Yeonwoo. “Don’t you go to school?” “I took a leave of absence. What about you, Yeonwoo?” “Me too. I will attend next year.” “Which school?” “University W.” His face was tinged with amazement. Yeonwoo heard a low pitched voice as if he had suppressed his emotions. “You are my senior.” #Emotion>Event #NoConflict Illustration By Meljwi Title Design By SAN

title: [BL] The Emperor's Dog [Complete Version for 19+]
description: Emperor Elector, who has lived his heavenly years and closed his eyes, woke up as Merwell Humanjack, the knight of the Grand Duke Vero, the hunting dog he had raised. “You must not let me discover that you are the emperor.” Staring at the wall so beautiful it was transparent, Merwell bit the cigarette filter in his mouth. He barely held the cigarette with his stiff fingers and opened his mouth. “...What happens if you find out?” His expression, which was always cold, changed at that sound. He opened his mouth with a smirk. “I plan to violate you.” “.......” Was the dog I raised a mad dog?

title: Bless You, Bless Me [BL] [Complete Version for 19+]
description: --He always wanted this man. Yoo Hyun-jin, a promising young priest of Je Yang-guk. He has been in love with the youngest son of the prestigious Hyun family, Hyun Tae-oh, for a long time. Knowing well that his feelings could never be reciprocated, he devoted himself to theology and is now on the verge of becoming a full-fledged priest. One night, a drinking party is held to welcome Archbishop Hyun Tae-oh, who has returned to the capital from a conflict zone after 7 years. Going to pick up his drunk younger brother, Hyun-jin accidentally ruins his clothes and ends up waiting for them to be washed in a restaurant's side room, unable to wear anything but a loincloth. And next to him is the naked Hyun Tae-oh, who has collapsed due to excessive drinking. The next morning, Hyun Tae-oh wakes up and misunderstands what happened the night before. Hyun-jin, who has secretly liked him since childhood, impulsively jokes that Hyun Tae-oh attacked him in his drunken state. But before he can explain that it was a joke, Hyun Tae-oh insists on taking responsibility for making a priest impure, and the situation spirals out of control as Hyun Tae-oh, the fiancé of the Princess of Je Yang-guk, suddenly breaks off his long-standing engagement with the royal family... What will be the outcome of the innocent one-night stand between Je Yang-guk's top cold-hearted strategist Hyun Tae-oh and Je Yang-guk's most naive and pure-hearted Yoo Hyun-jin?
author: Yoo Woo-ji
price: Wait until Free Period is 1 days

title: Sole Omega in an Alpha Family
description: When I was young, I met Lee Jungin at the orphanage. We had the same name and birthday. The only difference was that he was the sole omega of a chaebol family. But after a car accident, I woke up in his body. “Take this body. It’s yours, Choi Jungin.” The moment Jungin saw this sentence on the very first line of a notebook he happened to find, his breath caught in his throat. We had joked about it before. Lee Jungin envied my freedom since I had no family, while I envied him for being wealthy and having siblings. But how…? How could this happen? He’s not a magician or a wizard; how can you just swap bodies at will? “It’s dangerous, child.” “Jungin, you need to be careful.” “Hey kid, let me take you to your room. Wrap your arms around my neck.” I’d heard that the alpha family considered Lee Jungin, born an omega, to be a disgrace, but his brothers’ behavior seemed a little strange. And that wasn’t the only odd thing. “Which bastard did this to you?” “Uh…” “I asked you, who messed with you, Lee Jungin?” Lee Jungin even had a fiancé—an extremely dominant alpha who treated him surprisingly well. “Jungin, tell me. Were all the things you said to me lies?” “Hey… Beomhyeon.” – Yeah? “Want to play a game?” With a self-deprecating smile, Jungin pressed the back of his hand against his hot eyes and asked: “Even if I were ugly, poor, without a family… Even if I were a beta… would you still like me?” – Yeah, I would have.” With trembling lips, Jungin closed his eyes as Beomhyeon’s steady voice, full of certainty, continued: – Don’t worry, Jungin. No matter what you look like or where you are, I’ll find you and love you more than anyone else in this world. The conversation with Beomhyeon gradually eased his anxious heart. – I love you, Jungin. I’ll take all your fears away, so you just keep smiling and be happy. Listening to the gentle voice whispering like a dream in his ear, Jungin fell into a deep sleep. For a very long time, until a new dawn, his phone remained turned off.  Modern, Omega Verse Strong Gong, Affectionate Gong, Devoted Gong, Tsundere Gong, Love Gong, Obsessed Gong, Crazy Gong, Chaebol Gong, Virile Gong, Handsome Gong Beautiful Soo, Affectionate Soo, Cheerful Soo, Foolish Soo, Pushover Soo, Outwardly Soft but Inwardly Strong Soo, Neat Soo, Chaebol Soo, Sickly Soo, Amnesiac Soo School/Campus, Friends to Lovers, First Love, Contract, Misunderstanding/Mistake, Politics/Society/Chaebol, Jealousy, Soul Swap, Mystery/Occult, Sweet, Screw-up, Daily Life, Healing
author: Gaudium
